0: Number of devices in one communication group for clock synchronization

NOTE 1:	5G synchronicity budget is the time error between ingress and egress of the 5G system on the path of clock synchronization messages (as described in Clause 5.6.0). For indirect network connection, 3 cases are considered:
If the path of clock synchronization messages is between device and network side, ingress and egress of the 5G system are the remote UE and the corresponding UPF on the network side.
If ingress and egress of the 5G system are at the device side, the 5G synchronicity budget is the time error between the involved remote UE and the 5G sync master.
If the sync master is inside the 5G system, the 5G synchronicity budget ingress is the sync master in the 5G system and egress is the remote UE.
NOTE 2:	Service Area for indirect network connections between UEs (length x width x height).
